title: I’m Finding The Best Photography Deals and Sharing Them With You Today in a Live Webcast
description: Erik Kuna and I have been scouring the Internet to find which companies have the best Cyber Monday deals on photography gear. We’re sharing them all today, LIVE, starting at 11:00 a.m. ET. If you know of any we might have missed, leave it (with a link) in the comments so we can include it. Here’s the info: Who: Erik Kuna and MeWhat: A live webcast with the best deals Erik and I find out there on photo gear. Where: Here’s the linkWhen: Monday, Dec. 2nd at 11:00 AM ETWhy: Because who doesn’t love a great deal? Hope you can join us. I imagine we’ll have a giveaway or two, too. See you then. -Scott The post I’m Finding The Best Photography Deals and Sharing Them With You Today in a Live Webcast appeared first on Lightroom Killer Tips.
author: Scott Kelby

html:
Erik Kuna and I have been scouring the Internet to find which companies have the best Cyber Monday deals on photography gear. We’re sharing them all today, LIVE, starting at 11:00 a.m. ET. If you know of any we might have missed, leave it (with a link) in the comments so we can include it.

Here’s the info:

Who: Erik Kuna and Me
What: A live webcast with the best deals Erik and I find out there on photo gear.
Where: Here’s the link
When: Monday, Dec. 2nd at 11:00 AM ET
Why: Because who doesn’t love a great deal?

Hope you can join us. I imagine we’ll have a giveaway or two, too. See you then.

-Scott
